strategies.name: usersWithEmail
strategies.description: Active for users defined  in the comma-separated emails-parameter.

strategies.name: flexibleRollout
strategies.description: Roll out to a percentage of your userbase, and ensure that the experience is the same for the user on each visit.

parameters.name: stickiness
parameters.description: Used define stickiness. Possible values: default, userId, sessionId, random

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Used to define a activation groups, which allows you to correlate across feature toggles.

tag_types.name: simple
tag_types.description: Arbitrary tags. Used to simplify filtering of features
